entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
